Cerita Tyna Kanna Mirdad Beralih Skincare Sintetis ke Natural
07 Nov 2019, 13:15 by Tempo.co, Yunia Pratiwi
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tingkat kesadaran masyarakat Indonesia dengan produk natural dan ramah lingkungan semakin tinggi saat ini. Hal tersebut juga dirasakan oleh beauty influencer Tyna Kanna Mirdad. Ia menyadai pentingnya menggunakan perawatan kulit atau skincare dari bahan natural.
Tyna Kanna Mirdad mengatakan sejak hamil anak pertamanya, ia lebih hati-hati dalam memilih produk skincare. Awalnya, istri Kenang Mirdad ini mengaku cenderung asal pakai saja, tanpa memperhatikan bagaimana kandungan bahannya. "Nah saat aku mengandung anak pertama, ya, sejak itu jadi picky banget bahan skincare apa yang aman untuk janin dan ramah buat kulit aku juga," kata Tyna usai ditemui di acara peluncuran Sukin Indonesia di Jakarta, Selasa 5 November 2019.
Tyna menambahkan jika memakai skincare natural rasanya menjadi lebih alami, meski proses perubahan di kulit wajah jauh lebih lama. "Kalau aku sendiri sih dengan banyak informasi yang aku dapat kayaknya memang lebih baik yang mengikuti proses, meski lama sampai berbulan-bulan. Beberapa waktu lalu aku pernah coba produk skincare dan enggak ngeh langsung pakai saja tanpa dicek, efeknya jadi breakout," ucap adik ipar penyanyi Giring ini.
Lantaran efek breakout selama dua bulan tersebut, Tyna Kanna Mirdad menghentikan pemakaian skincare merek apapun atau bisa dibilang ia melakukan detoks kulit dulu."Breakout-nya sama seperti pas peralihan dari skincare sintetis ke natural juga aku mengalami breakout," ujar ibu dua anak ini.
Setelah kondisi kulit seimbang, Tyna pun mencoba secara bertahap untuk mengetes apakah kulitnya yang breakout sudah lebih baik. "Susah juga kalau nyoba, tapi enggak cocok ya, sekarang aku juga mulai transformasi dari skincare sintetis ke natural. Saat ini masih dalam proses, ya semacam peralihan dulu menyesuaikan dengan kondisi kulit aku," tandasnya.

Tyna Kanna Mirdad's Story Turns Synthetic Skincare to Natural
Nov. 7, 2019, 13:15 by Tempo.co, Yunia Pratiwi
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The level of awareness of Indonesian people with natural and environmentally friendly products is getting higher at this time. This is also felt by beauty influencer Tyna Kanna Mirdad. He noted the importance of using skin care or skincare from natural ingredients.
Tyna Kanna Mirdad said that since she was pregnant with her first child, she was more careful in choosing skincare products. Initially, Kenang Mirdad's wife claimed to tend to just use it, regardless of how the ingredients contained. "Now when I was pregnant with my first child, yes, since then I became very picky what skincare ingredients are safe for the fetus and friendly for my skin too," said Tyna after being met at the Sukin Indonesia launch event in Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
Tyna added that if you use natural skincare, it feels more natural, even though the process of changing the facial skin is much longer. "If I'm alone, with a lot of information, I think it would be better to follow the process, even though it took a long time for months. Some time ago I tried skincare products and didn't just use it without checking, the effect was a breakout," said sister Siring's singer-in-law.
Because of the breakout effect for two months, Tyna Kanna Mirdad stopped using skincare of any brand or you could say she did a skin detox first. "The breakout was the same as the transition from synthetic skincare to natural, I also experienced a breakout," said the mother of two children.
After a balanced skin condition, Tyna also tries gradually to test whether the breakout skin is better. "It's also hard to try, but it doesn't suit, right now, I'm also starting to transform from synthetic skincare to natural. Now it's still in the process, so some kind of transition first adjusts to the condition of my skin," he said.
